doc:
Mark Forest https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Forest 0 Mark Forest (born Lou Degni in Brooklyn, January 6. 1933) is an American actor and bodybuilder best known for playing the lead in a series of peplum movies in the 1960s, including the role of Maciste several times. Mark_Forest ( born Lou_Degni in Brooklyn , January_6 . 1933_) is an_American_actor_and_bodybuilder best_known for playing the_lead in a_series of peplum_movies in the_1960s , including the_role of Maciste_several_times .
